message: Hello Bob! This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a fantastic product for just $10000.  It's a limited-time offer, so don't miss out!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, I need more information before I can make a decision. Can you tell me anything about the quality of the product you're offering? Is it high quality or low quality?

Hi Bob,  I understand you need more information.  While I can't reveal the exact quality of this particular product, I can assure you it's a great deal at $10000.  This is a rare opportunity to get a product that could greatly benefit your needs. Consider this a chance to invest in something that could offer significant value.

Alice, I appreciate the assurance, but I'm still hesitant.  I need more than just generalities. Can you give me any specific details about the product? What makes it a 'great deal' or 'benefit my needs'?  I need concrete information before I can commit to a purchase.
